title: **Final Price Reduction 8/23**FS 5 T206s with Rare Backs and HOFers  (Pictures added)

posts.post_title: **Final Price Reduction 8/23**FS 5 T206s with Rare Backs and HOFers  (Pictures added)
posts.post_content:
Hey everyone,

I am looking to free up some funds for another T206 card... I have decided to list the following 5 for sale. I prefer Paypal gift so I can avoid fees. But a money order/check is ok also.

All prices include shipping/insurance. please email me at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url] if interested.

T206 Young Portrait SGC 20, Sweet Cap 150 Back... $370
T206 Evers Chicago on shirt SGC 40, American beauty 350 Back. (only 2 graded by SGC. This is the finest example graded by SGC.)... $475
T206 Willetts SGC 40. American Beauty 460... $225
T206 Cobb Green Background SGC 20, Sweet cap 150... $900
T206 Burch Batting SGC 10, Brown Hindu Back... $225
